item.title: Audi RS Q8
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Audi RS Q8 Rental in Dubai

At Legendary Car Rental, we know Dubai isn’t just a city, it’s a playground. And what better way to own the road than behind the wheel of the Audi RS Q8, a beast that blends raw power with head-turning elegance? Whether you’re zipping down Sheikh Zayed Road, cruising the Palm Jumeirah, or making a grand entrance at Dubai Marina, this SUV is your ticket to an unforgettable adventure. At Legendary Car Rental, it's not just about the car or the best rates, it's about the peace of mind that we are giving you, including comprehensive insurance, free delivery, and pickup. You can get an Audi RS Q8 rental in Dubai with an easy booking process and affordable rates! Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Rent from Legendary Car Rental?

We’re not your average Audi car rental Dubai company. Here’s the scoop: ✅ No Hidden Fees: Transparent pricing? Always. ✅ 24/7 Support: Flat tire at 2 AM? We’ve got your back. ✅ Flexible Rentals: Need it for a day, a week, or a month? No sweat. ✅ Full Insurance: Drive stress-free with comprehensive coverage. Oh, and we’ll even throw in a free delivery anywhere in Dubai. Because legendary service is kinda our thing.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?   Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?   You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?   The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?   Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?   You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em   Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

item.title: BMW 430i
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

BMW Rental in Dubai

Looking for BMW 430i rental in Dubai that's equal parts fun and sophistication? Say hello to your new favorite ride. At Legendary Car Rental, we get it you're here to turn heads, not just check landmarks off a list. Enter the BMW 430i, where sleek design meets effortless performance. Picture this: gliding through Dubai Marina's glittering skyline, top down (if you opt for the convertible!), breeze in your hair, and the city's energy at your fingerprints.
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Legendary Car Rental? (Note: We're Not Basic)

✅ Zero Surprises: All-inclusive pricing, no hidden fees. ✅ 24/7 Roadside Rescue: Flat tire? Dead battery? We’ll fix it faster than you can say “Luxury Car Rental Dubai.” ✅ Flexy AF: Rent by the hour, day, or month. Spontaneous plans? We salute you. ✅ Full Coverage Insurance: Because Dubai’s roads are wild, but your peace of mind shouldn’t be. Oh, and we’ll drop the car off anywhere in Dubai. Your hotel, the airport, even that cute café in Al Quoz—you name it.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai? Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere? You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai? The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai? Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed? You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

item.title: BMW M3
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

BMW M3 Rental in Dubai

Looking for a Luxury car rental in Dubai, that combines thrilling performance with luxury? The BMW M3 is a perfect choice. At Legendary Car Rental, we offer the best selection of luxury car rentals in Dubai, ensuring a seamless and exhilarating driving experience. We know that when you rent a luxury car in Dubai, you are looking for more than just transportation, you're looking for an experience. That's exactly what we provide.

Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Premium Fleet – All our cars are new, well-maintained, and fully loaded for an unforgettable ride. ✅ Best Prices – Get the best BMW car rental in Dubai price without sacrificing quality. ✅ Easy Booking – Hassle-free reservation process with 24/7 customer service. ✅ FREE Delivery Anywhere in Dubai – Your BMW M3 will be delivered to your location, whether it’s your hotel, the airport, or your residence. Flexible Rental Plans – Rent by the day, week, or month at unbeatable rates.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?   Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?   You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?   The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?   Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?   You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em   Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?","_id":"a2f28a0","acc_content":"

You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?","_id":"8ea6483","acc_content":"

The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental.<\/p>"},{"_id":"22cc462","acc_title":"How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?","acc_content":"

Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it\u2019s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online.<\/p>"},{"_id":"9a02f21","acc_title":"Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?","acc_content":"

You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:<\/p>

  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.<\/li>
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.<\/li>
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.<\/li><\/ol>"},{"_id":"1771b35","acc_title":"Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em","acc_content":"

    Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. item.title: BMW M4
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

BMW M4 Rental in Dubai

If you're the type who thinks driving should feel like a red carpet moment, the BMW M4 Convertible is the perfect choice. At Legendary Car Rental, we're all about turning your Dubai trip into a blockbuster experience. We bring you the finest selection of luxury car rentals in Dubai. And trust us, the M4 isn't just a car, it's a head turning, heart racing, "did you see that?" kind of ride. Whether you're cruising Jumeirah Beach Road or tearing up the desert highways, the BMW M4 delivers power, precision, and pure driving pleasure.

  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Premium Fleet: All our cars are new, well-maintained, and fully loaded for an unforgettable ride. ✅ Best Prices: Get the best BMW car rental in Dubai price without sacrificing quality. ✅ Easy Booking: Hassle-free reservation process with 24/7 customer service. ✅ FREE Delivery Anywhere in Dubai: Your BMW M4 will be delivered to your location, whether it’s your hotel, the airport, or your residence. Flexible Rental Plans – Rent by the day, week, or month at unbeatable rates.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai? Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere? You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai? The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai? Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed? You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

item.title: BMW X6
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

BMW X6 Rental Dubai

Looking for an SUV that blends power, luxury, and cutting edge technology? The BMW X6 is your perfect match. At Legendary Car Rental, we bring you the best BMW X6 rental Dubai, offering a premium experience. Whether you're exploring the city or heading on a road trip, with its bold design, high performance engine, and refined interior, the BMW X6 ensures an exhilarating drive like no other.

Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our BMW X6 is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your BMW X6 delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai? Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere? You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai? The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai? Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed? You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

item.title: Genesis G70
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Genesis G70 Rental Dubai

Dubai is a city that thrives on luxury, elegance, and cutting edge automotive engineering. Finding a Genesis G70 rental Dubai is easy with Legendary Car Rental, your trusted provider for luxury car rental in Dubai. We offer flexible plans, whether you need the car for a day, a week, or even longer. Our fleet is well maintained, and our customer service ensures a seamless rental experience from start to finish.

If you're visiting for business, leisure, or just want to cruise the streets in a luxury car, the Genesis G70 is a perfect choice. With its sleek design, powerful performance, and premium comfort, this sedan redefines what it means to drive in style. Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Genesis G70 is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Genesis G70 delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?   Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?   You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?   The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?   Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?   You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em   Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?","ekit_acc_is_active":"","_id":"33d0b2e","acc_content":"

Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?","_id":"a2f28a0","acc_content":"

You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?","_id":"8ea6483","acc_content":"

The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental.<\/p>"},{"_id":"22cc462","acc_title":"How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?","acc_content":"

Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it\u2019s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online.<\/p>"},{"_id":"9a02f21","acc_title":"Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?","acc_content":"

You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:<\/p>

  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.<\/li>
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.<\/li>
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.<\/li><\/ol>"},{"_id":"1771b35","acc_title":"Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em","acc_content":"

    Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.\u00a0<\/p>"}],"ekit_adv_tooltip_content":"Tooltip item.title: Lamborghini Huracan Evo Spyder
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Rent Lamborghini Huracan Evo Spyder Dubai

Experience the thrill of Italian engineering with the Lamborghini Huracan Evo Spyder. At Legendary Car Rental, we bring you the best and easiest luxury car rental in Dubai. You can rent Lamborghini Huracan Evo Spyder Dubai with comprehensive insurance included, best rates, free pickup and delivery!

The Huracan Evo Spyder is not just a supercar, it's an adrenaline packed experience. Its 5.2L V10 engine produces 640 horsepower, launching you from 0 to 100km/h in just 3.1 seconds.

  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Lamborghini Huracan Evo Spyder is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Lamborghini Huracan Evo Spyder delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?   Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?   You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?   The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?   Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?   You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em   Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

item.title: Lamborghini Urus
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Rent Lamborghini Urus in Dubai

When a sports car meets SUV practicality, you get the Lamborghini Urus, the world's first Super Sport Utility Vehicle. At Legendary Car Rental, we offer the best Lamborghini car rental in Dubai. The Lamborghini Urus isn't just an SUV, it's a statement of power, prestige, and performance. Its 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine rockets from 0 to 100km/h in just 3.6 seconds, making it the fastest SUV in the world.

  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Lamborghini Urus is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Lamborghini Urus delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai? Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere? You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai? The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai? Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed? You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?","_id":"a2f28a0","acc_content":"

You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?","_id":"8ea6483","acc_content":"

The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental.<\/p>"},{"_id":"22cc462","acc_title":"How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?","acc_content":"

Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it\u2019s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online.<\/p>"},{"_id":"9a02f21","acc_title":"Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?","acc_content":"

You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:<\/p>

  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.<\/li>
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.<\/li>
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.<\/li><\/ol>"},{"_id":"1771b35","acc_title":"Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em","acc_content":"

item.title: Lamborghini STO
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Rent Lamborghini STO in Dubai

Experience the raw power and precision of track focused supercar with the Lamborghini Huracan STO. At Legendary Car Rental, we offer the best Lamborghini or Luxury car rental in Dubai. Lamborghini Huracan STO has a 5.2L V10 engine delivering 640 horsepower, hitting 0-100 km/h in just 3.0 seconds.

  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Lamborghini STO is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Lamborghini STO delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai? Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere? You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai? The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai? Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed? You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

item.title: McLaren 720S
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

McLaren 720S rental dubai

At Legendary Car Rental, we bring you the best McLaren 720S rental dubai service, ensuring you experience the perfect fusion of power, innovation, and luxury. And for power, innovation, and luxury the McLaren 720S is the perfect choice. With its lightweight carbon fiber chassis, breathtaking aerodynamics, and a monstrous 4.0L twin turbocharged V8 engine, this beast delivers an astonishing 720 horsepower, launching from 0-100 km/h in just 2.9 seconds.

Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our McLaren 720S is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your McLaren 720S delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?   Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?   You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?   The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?   Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?   You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em   Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

item.title: Mercedes AMG GTR
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Mercedes AMG GTR Rental Dubai

The Mercedes AMG GTR is a track-inspired supercar designed to dominate the road with its aggressive styling, raw performance, and race-ready technology. 4.0L twin-turbocharged V8 engine unleashes an explosive 577 horsepower, propelling this beast from 0-100 km/h in just 3.5 seconds.

At Legendary Car Rental, we offer the best luxury car rental in Dubai, bringing you the best Mercedes AMG GTR rental Dubai. Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Mercedes AMG GTR is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Mercedes AMG GTR delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?   Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?   You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?   The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?   Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?   You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em   Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?","ekit_acc_is_active":"","_id":"33d0b2e","acc_content":"

Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?","_id":"a2f28a0","acc_content":"

You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?","_id":"8ea6483","acc_content":"

The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental.<\/p>"},{"_id":"22cc462","acc_title":"How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?","acc_content":"

Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it\u2019s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online.<\/p>"},{"_id":"9a02f21","acc_title":"Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?","acc_content":"

You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:<\/p>

  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.<\/li>
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.<\/li>
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.<\/li><\/ol>"},{"_id":"1771b35","acc_title":"Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em","acc_content":"

    Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.\u00a0<\/p>"}],"ekit_adv_tooltip_content":"Tooltip item.title: Mercedes Benz C300
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Rent Mercedes Benz C300 in Dubai

The Mercedes Benz C300 is where luxury, technology, and performance come together in a sleek, stylish package. The C300 delivers a smooth, powerful, and refined driving experience. With its turbocharged 2.0L engine, this luxury sedan is the perfect choice for both business and leisure travelers.

At Legendary Car Rental, we offer the best Luxury car rental in Dubai, ensuring a hassle-free experience with competitive rates, easy booking, and premium service. Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Mercedes Benz C300 is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Mercedes Benz C300 delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai? Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere? You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai? The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai? Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed? You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

item.title: Mercedes E350
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Rent Mercedes Benz E350 in Dubai

Looking for the Mercedes Benz E350? At Legendary Car Rental, we provide premium Mercedes car rental in Dubai, offering competitive rates, hassle-free booking, and exceptional service.

The Mercedes Benz E350 is an icon of sophistication, delivering an exceptional driving experience with its powerful 2.0L turbocharged engine, premium comfort, and cutting edge features. Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Mercedes Benz E350 is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Mercedes Benz E350 delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai? Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere? You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai? The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai? Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed? You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?","ekit_acc_is_active":"","_id":"33d0b2e","acc_content":"

Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?","_id":"a2f28a0","acc_content":"

You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?","_id":"8ea6483","acc_content":"

The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental.<\/p>"},{"_id":"22cc462","acc_title":"How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?","acc_content":"

Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it\u2019s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online.<\/p>"},{"_id":"9a02f21","acc_title":"Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?","acc_content":"

You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:<\/p>

  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.<\/li>
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.<\/li>
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.<\/li><\/ol>"},{"_id":"1771b35","acc_title":"Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em","acc_content":"

    Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.\u00a0<\/p>"}],"ekit_adv_tooltip_content":"Tooltip item.title: Mercedes GLC 300
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Rent Mercedes GLC 300 in Dubai

The Mercedes Benz GLC 300 is the perfect blend of elegance, power, and advanced technology. With its sleek design, refined interior, and effortless performance, this luxury SUV delivers an exceptional driving experience. Whether you're navigating the vibrant streets of Dubai or heading on a weekend getaway, the GLC 300 ensures a smooth and stylish ride.

Legendary Car Rental offers the best luxury car rental in Dubai, providing top-tier service, seamless booking, and affordable rates for your ultimate luxury drive. Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Mercedes GLC 300 is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Mercedes GLC 300 delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?   Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?   You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?   The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?   Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?   You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em   Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

item.title: Mercedes AMG GT53
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Rent Mercedes AMG GT53 in Dubai

The AMG GT53 is not just a car, it's an experience. Built for those who crave speed but demand comfort, this luxury sports coupe offers a blend of performance and elegance.

With its powerful 3.0L turbocharged engine and cutting edge AMG technology, this luxury car delivers an exhilarating driving experience. Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Mercedes AMG GT53 is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Mercedes AMG GT53 delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?   Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?   You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?   The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?   Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?   You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em   Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us

any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai?","ekit_acc_is_active":"","_id":"33d0b2e","acc_content":"

Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere?","_id":"a2f28a0","acc_content":"

You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period.<\/p>"},{"acc_title":"How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai?","_id":"8ea6483","acc_content":"

The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental.<\/p>"},{"_id":"22cc462","acc_title":"How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai?","acc_content":"

Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it\u2019s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online.<\/p>"},{"_id":"9a02f21","acc_title":"Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed?","acc_content":"

You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:<\/p>

  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.<\/li>
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.<\/li>
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.<\/li><\/ol>"},{"_id":"1771b35","acc_title":"Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em","acc_content":"

    Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. item.title: Nissan Patrol Platinum
item.dc:creator: luxurycarrental
item.content:encoded:
Free Delivery & Pickup

Hassle-free transport service  

Insurance Included

Coverage for peace of mind

General Information

Rent Nissan Patrol in Dubai

This full size luxury SUV is built to deliver unmatched comfort, advanced technology, and top-tier performance. Whether you're exploring Dubai's vibrant streets or heading out for a rugged off road experience, the Nissan Patrol Platinum rental ensures a smooth and commanding drive.

At Legendary Car Rental, we offer the best Nissan Patrol rental in Dubai, giving you access to premium SUVs at affordable rates with flexible rental options. Contact us WhatsApp Us
  • 1 Day Rental Available
  • Insurance Included
  • Free Delivery and Pickup
  • Pay at Pickup

Why Choose Legendary Car Rental for your Luxury Car Rentals in Dubai?

✅ Top-Quality Fleet: Our Nissan Patrol Platinum is meticulously maintained for peak performance and comfort. ✅ Best Rental Rates: Competitive pricing with no hidden fees for luxury car rentals in Dubai. ✅ Convenient Booking: Book online or via WhatsApp for a seamless reservation experience. ✅ FREE Delivery: Get your Nissan Patrol Platinum delivered anywhere in Dubai. Flexible Rental Terms: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are available to suit your needs.

Car Features

Premium amenities and features

  • Cruise Control
  • 3D Surround Camera
  • Memory Front Seats
  • Blind Spot Warning
  • Parking Assist
  • Paddle Shift (Triptronic)
  • Powered Tailgate
  • Power Seats
  • SRS Airbags
  • Front & Rear Airbags
  • Automatic Emergency Braking
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • Premium Audio
  • Rear AC
  • Power Windows
  • Seat Belt Reminder
  • USB Ports
  • Android Auto
  • Fog Lights
  • Climate Control

FAQs

Policies and agreement

Does any mileage limit apply while renting a car in Dubai? Yes, all the luxury car rentals in Dubai apply a mileage limit of 250 km per day. However, if you have a more extended travel plan, you can ask us to increase the limit by paying extra charges. We can customize the plan, for example, by renting hours and mileage according to your requirements. Can I park a luxury car for rent in Dubai anywhere? You can park your rental car from Luxury Car Rental Dubai at specific spots designated for rentals, ranging from roadside to underground parking. While parking is accessible all over Dubai, please note that as the renter, you are responsible for any parking fines incurred during the rental period. How much is it to rent a luxury car in Dubai? The average cost of luxury car rental in Dubai depends upon the brand, model, and rent duration. It can increase by adding extra customizations such as additional mileage. So, the prices range from AED300 to AED 10000 at Legendary Car Rental. How can I book a luxury car rental company in Dubai? Legendary car rental in Dubai offers you a vast fleet of cars for rent. With thousands of satisfied customers, highly maintained vehicles, and affordable prices, it’s the best car luxury rental Dubai. So, to book a luxury car, reach out to us and make your booking online. Is renting a luxury car in Dubai with a visit visa allowed? You can book a luxury car rental in Dubai on a visit visa. However, you may need to go the extra mile for that:
  1. You must share a driving license, local or international.
  2. You might have to pay a security deposit.
  3. You must be over 21 and may purchase insurance to rent a luxury car in Dubai.
Accordion ItHow to book a luxury car rental in Dubai with Legendary?em Legendary Car Rental offers you an easy online booking process. You need to explore our online platform and look for your favorite vehicle. After scrolling through different brands and finalizing the luxury car for rent in Dubai, you can go for a booking. To rent it, you can fill out the booking form or call us and contact us directly. We will let you know about the availability of the vehicle and book it for you if available.

Testimonials

What our customers are saying about us
